group_1.textRight: Hey-ohhh! Mind if I join you?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Natsuki! Sure!

group_1.textRight: Let's knock another Witch into next week!

group_1.textLeft: ...!@...[chara:300800:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_001]Sure!
(Looks like someone's@had a little breakthrough...!)
Ta-daaa! I want you to have this!@It's a little present from me.

group_1.textRight: Aw, a cute charm? For me...?

group_1.textLeft: Yep!

group_1.textRight: What made you want to give@me this all of a sudden?
"Labyrinth...Safety..."@That's not a combo I've heard before...

group_1.textLeft: That's because I made it myself!

group_1.textRight: Wait, really?!@You sewed all of this...?

group_1.textLeft: Uh huh!

group_1.textRight: So that's why it says[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json] Labyrinth@Safety! I thought that was weird.

group_1.textLeft: Yet perfect for a Magical Girl, right?

group_1.textRight: Haha, definitely! Okay seriously though,@[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]what made you want to make this for me?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I made a bunch[chara:300201:cheek_1] for the baseball team.
Er, but they don't say Labyrinth Safety!@They just wish the guys luck on their exams.
Anyway, I made them to show@that I've made up my mind...
I've decided I won't fear change...
And I'll keep doing [chara:300201:motion_100]what I do to help@everyone be the best they can be.
Thanks, by the way.
For listening to me ramble on...@And giving me a lot to think about...
I appreciate it.
I feel a lot better now.
It was really good advice...
I can see why the other girls look up to you.

group_1.textRight: Huh? Oh no, not you too! The pressure!

group_1.textLeft: Hahaha!
Oh, wait!@I've got another charm for you!
Here!

group_1.textRight: "Love"... What's gotten into you?@This one's even further out of left field...

group_1.textLeft: It is? I thought you were into@mushy, romantic stuff!

group_1.textRight: I! Don't you!@For the last time, I am not!

group_1.textLeft: Then why are you blushing?

group_1.textRight: Because I'm embarrassed@by how WRONG YOU ARE!
